title: Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail: Donate
body: Donate       The Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail partners with the Chesapeake Conservancy, a not-for-profit conservation organization dedicated to appreciation and enjoyment of the Chesapeake Bay. The National Park Service encourages your support of the Conservancy with your tax-deductible donation. Visit the website for the Chesapeake Conservancy here.
